name: VNlytics
body:
VNlytics is a narrative analytics system for story based games.

It enables player choices to be recorded for developer analysis, or additionally returned to the player, to compare their choices with others.

## Usage
The system was designed for the [Ren'Py Visual Novel Engine](https://www.renpy.org/), but should be easily reconfigurable to work with other projects.

## License
This code is freely available under the BSD license. Please feel free to contribute to enhance it and modify it.

## Authors and Contributors
From Dipesh Aggarwal (@DragoonHP), and Nell Watson (@nellwatson).

## Support or Contact
Having trouble with VNlytics? Please [contact support](www.nellwatson.com/about) and weâ€™ll do our best to help you figure it out.
